titles.title: ANCHOR Act
Accelerating Networking, Cyberinfrastructure, and Hardware for Oceanic Research Act
ANCHOR Act
Accelerating Networking, Cyberinfrastructure, and Hardware for Oceanic Research Act
ANCHOR Act
A bill to require a plan to improve the cybersecurity and telecommunications of the U.S. Academic Research Fleet, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Cantwell without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 483.

committee.name: Senate Commerce, Science, and Transportation
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
